channel.description: Recent content in cron on Some Title

item.title: Can programs started using cron be made interactive?
item.description: ## I wanted to run an interactive program with cron I’m running a project to track the lending history of books at a certain place, and want to use the Raspberry Pi as feedback and whether the barcode was read correctly or not. I plan to manage based on ISBN, so I created a program in Python that receives the input of the barcode reader and returns the feedback “OK if it is OK, NG otherwise”.
